SQL.LOAD: SELECT filename, process_flag, received, counted, rejected, validated, loaded, bypassed, is_deleted, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, svc_notification_processed_id FROM elp_svc_notification_processed WHERE svc_notification_processed_id = :svc_notification_processed_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT svc_notification_processed_id, filename, process_flag, received, counted, rejected, validated, loaded, bypassed, is_deleted, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, svc_notification_processed_id FROM elp_svc_notification_processed WHERE is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY filename desc
SQL.LOAD_LIST_FILE: SELECT svc_notification_processed_id, filename, process_flag, received, counted, rejected, validated, loaded, bypassed, is_deleted, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, svc_notification_processed_id FROM elp_svc_notification_processed WHERE svc_notification_processed_id = :svc_notification_processed_id and is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY filename desc
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_svc_notification_processed SET filename = :filename, process_flag = :process_flag, received = :received, counted = :counted, rejected = :rejected, validated = :validated, loaded = :loaded, bypassed = :bypassed, is_deleted = :is_deleted, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE svc_notification_processed_id = :svc_notification_processed_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_svc_notification_processed ( filename, process_flag, received, counted, rejected, validated, loaded, bypassed, is_deleted, created_by, svc_notification_processed_id ) VALUES ( :filename, :process_flag, :received, :counted, :rejected, :validated, :loaded, :bypassed, :is_deleted, :created_by, :svc_notification_processed_id )
